Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Deku Stick#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask# yields #Din's Fire#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #the Biggoron Sword#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #diving experiment# is rewarded with #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.
